name: My Frog
description: This was made for the YellingFrog Jam #1. I joined a couple of days after the start of the jam. I saw the theme was Tamagothchi so I thought it would be cool to try to emulate one of those devices. Also, being a part of the YellingFrog Jam... I went with a frog. I would have liked to have created a song for the background for this but I was unable due to time and scope. I had very little to test anything really, I am just hoping that the code works and little bugs present themselves. It is possible that it will take a while for the pet to evolve, but I was not able to test it fully. I will possibly make edits after if there are game-breaking bugs.
